page.title: 05Westhill Shopping Centre
page.content: The Westhill{shopping centre}is situated in the centre of Westhill, and provides a wide variety of shopping{facilities}.There are 22 units in the complex.Included are;a butchers, greengrocers, hairdressers, fastfood shop,DIY outlet, newsagents,a beauty salon, clothes shop and a delicatssen.Also included in the centre are a video shop,a bank,an estate agents and a branch of the Abbey National Building Society. The most recent shop to open is NORCO,a large supermarket.Prior to its opening most residents had to travel to Aberdeen 15 kilometres away to do their monthly shopping:now,many people shop in Westhill.The shopping centre is not only popular with the inhabitants of Westhill,but also with the people who live in the nearby villages of Elrick and Skene.
